metadata.description: A four-issue miniseries wasn't enough for TV's original Batman! Fueled by his imagination (and a magical amulet), Adam West continues his travels through time, space, and alternate realities fighting evil-doers in his very own ongoing series. Villains be warned. A true American hero is back in business. Better buckle your seatbelts.
metadata.name: Mis-Adventures of Adam West: Ongoing
